document_data.name: Foxmantle
document_data.mainbody: The '''Foxmantles''' were one of the merchant-noble families of [[Sembia]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Their businesses included farming, pressing [[wine]], growing dyestuffs, salting meat, and tanning hides and furs. Their family crest was three vigilant eyes in purple set on a slant.

document_data.Properties: The Foxmantle family home overlooked [[Rauthauvyr's Road]].
